name: and another thing!
description:
big ol tw for mentions of anxiety and suicidal thoughts

--

hang on, i actually have more to say

a companion piece of sorts to should i go back to therapy before i ruin everything?

is it autobiographical? is it a slightly fictionalized monologue? is it from multiple perspectives, or just one? is it a collection, or perhaps one long continuous poem? is it a game? is it an exaggeration of anxiety, or a realistic portrayal? it it a substitute for professionalism? is it all of these things? is it none of them? i don't know! find out for yourself!

--

disclaimers:

and another thing! may require scrolling, depending on your screen dimensions. some poems may look better on a desktop or laptop computer, so keep that in mind if you're reading on your phone. do not ingest poems with alcohol.

after you've seen everything, check out this collection's thematically appropriate unofficial theme song.
